title: Headphones of the Year 2017: Sony's wireless wonders win again
description:
![Sony
WH-1000XM2](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

  * [Awards](https://www.trustedreviews.com/tag/awards)

**Sony takes second headphone victory in two years at 2017’s coveted Trusted
Reviews Awards.**

Sony has done it again, winning the Trusted Reviews Headphones of the Year
award for a second time in a row. This year, the headphones to get are the
Sony WH-1000XM2.

Last year’s [Sony MDR-1000X](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sony-
mdr-1000x) were a hard act to follow but Sony has managed to improve them with
intelligent adaptive noise cancellation, which adjusts itself according to
your actions. There were also small refinements, such as improved control
responsiveness, which made these headphones better than the originals.

**Related:[Best wireless
headphones](https://www.trustedreviews.com/guide/best-wireless-headphones-
best-bluetooth-headphones)**

The noise cancelling headphone market is tougher than ever, but Sony has
managed to hold off competition from the [Bose QuietComfort 35
II](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/bose-quietcomfort-35-ii) and the
[B&W PX](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/bowers-wilkins-px).

**Buy Now:[ Sony WH-1000XM2 at Amazon from £329](http://amzn.to/2zGbbbk)**

In our review, we said: “The new 1000X get so many things right it’s hard to
fault them. They sound great, the noise cancellation is effective, and most of
the features are genuinely useful. If you’re looking for an everyday pair of
headphones, these are hard to beat.”
